captions.text:
Wow. Thanks a lot.
Yeah. You really crush
that ball at the tee.

You'd be something
at one of those
long-drive contests.

You could probably
make a very good living
hustling at driving ranges.

Thanks, Phil.
That's-- That's--
That's--

You know, I know what
you're doin' right now,
and I don't like it,

so why don't you just
shut your trap before
I put my foot in it?

Don't turn
your back on me.

Let's get one thing straight:
This is Shooter's Tour.

I've worked hard
my whole life, paid my dues,
and now it's Shooter's turn.

Shooter's not about to let
his reign at the top be spoiled
by some freak sideshow clown.

Did you just call me a freak?
I was on this tour
for one reason: money.

But now I got a new reason:
kickin' your ass.

Well.
[ Chuckles ]
I'd like to see you try.

Let's do it then.
I-- I meant
on a golf course.

<i>Hey.! Hey, what's</i>
<i>going on here, huh?</i>

Oh, there's some of it.
There's some
right there too.

Why don't you
just put it down?
Yeah, I know.

Just stay out of my way...
or you'll pay.
Listen to what I say.

How 'bout I just
go eat some hay?

I can make things
out of clay and lay
by the bay. I just may.
<i>What do you say?</i>

title: Happy Gilmore (7/9) Movie CLIP - Rhyming with Shooter (1996) HD

Shit Like You For Breakfast. Sandler: You Eat Pieces Of Shit For Breakfast?

Since Iron Giant.
